name: Compass
title: Compass
author: Gangsir
contact: The best way to reach me is to PM me on Reddit, at /u/Gangsir. It is also possible to contact me by creating an issue on the github page of this project, in the homepage field.
description: Adds a command and a keybind to find the nearest entity specified. It will give the distance, and rough direction. Useful for finding vehicles, setups, or biters.
